item.title: About
item.description: Hi, I am KatsuragiCSL, just another security enthusiast who like writing. I do (web/mobile) pentesting as my daytime job, sometimes redteaming and other weird stuffs. At night, I play with malwares (both writing them and dissecting them), explore the secrets of binaries. This blog is a place for me to share what I learnt, what I experimented, occationally some tutorial series and shitposting :) You can connect with me on Linkedin or ping me on twitter if you like.
